title: Lila - An Inquiry into Morals - By Robert M. Pirsig - Chapter 30
description: Things pull together in this chapter in mind-blowing ways. Much time could be spent in discussion of this chapter alone. This is sort of a meta analysis of human spiritual and cultural evolution through the MoQ lens, and concentrating on one Sanskrit word - Rta...stunningly played. Probably my favorite chapter.
